class_notes:
This is a 2-part course.  In part 1 students complete online didactic course content asynchronously.  In part 2, students will self-register in Canvas for one synchronous session taking place at the following dates and times:
1. Jan. 18: 6-8:30pm
2. January 25: 6-8:30pm
3. January 28: 9:30-12pm
4. February 1: 6-8:30pm
5. February 4: 9:30-12pm
course_description: This course will introduce public health students to concepts of leadership including various leadership styles; emotional intelligence; collaboration; principles of project management including budgets, human resources, conflict, negotiation and mediation. Lastly, the course will introduce key aspects of audience-appropriate communication and will discuss communication frameworks specific to public health communication.
sections: Class Nbr: 4220, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Blake, Status: Open
